Apply for early education: step 1 of 6

About You

We'll need to contact you to let you know the outcome of your application. Please enter your information carefully to ensure that we can get in-touch.

If you receive any benefits such as income support or job seeker's allowance, please ensure your information matches what is printed on your benefits documentation.

Please tell us either your National Insurance Number or Asylum Seeker Support Number.

Your National Insurance number should be printed on your payslip or at the top of any letters or documentation you've received from the Department for Work & Pensions or JobCentre Plus.

Your Asylum Seeker Support Number will have been given to you by the Asylum Seeker Support Service and will be printed on any letters you've received from them.
